languages.text: "Инквизиция в моем лице готова проявить экстраординарную лояльность к вашей персоне. Во имя нашего бесценного сотрудничества я закрою глаза на... мелкие вольности, которые вы, почтенный Вольный Торговец, позволяли себе или позволите в будущем".

traits.locale_text: "Но не вызовут. Я могу порадовать вас новостью, что Инквизиция готова проявить экстраординарную лояльность к вашей персоне. Я буду игнорировать мелкие вольности, которые вы, почтенный Вольный Торговец, себе позволите, во имя нашего бесценного сотрудничества. Надеюсь, вы оцените щедрость этого предложения, как оценила в свое время Теодора".

languages.text: "The Inquisition, which I represent, is willing to show extraordinary faith in your person. For the sake of our invaluable partnership, I am going to ignore any... minor liberties that you, esteemed Rogue Trader, may have afforded yourself or may again in the future."
languages.original_text: "Инквизиция в моем лице готова проявить экстраординарную лояльность к вашей персоне. Во имя нашего бесценного сотрудничества я закрою глаза на... мелкие вольности, которые вы, почтенный Вольный Торговец, позволяли себе или позволите в будущем".

traits.locale_text: "The Inquisition, which I represent, is willing to show extraordinary faith in your person. For the sake of our invaluable partnership, I am going to ignore any... minor liberties that you, esteemed Rogue Trader, might have indulged or might indulge in the future."

"The Inquisition, which I represent, is willing to show extraordinary faith in your person. For the sake of our invaluable partnership, I am going to ignore any... minor liberties that you, esteemed Rogue Trader, might have indulged or might indulge in the future."

"The Inquisition, which I represent, is willing to show extraordinary faith in your person. For the sake of our invaluable partnership, I am going to ignore any... minor liberties that you, esteemed Rogue Trader, may have afforded yourself or may again in the future."

languages.text: 「異端審問庁の代表は私だ。お前という人間を特別に篤く信頼しようではないか。真に有益な相互関係のために、私は何であれ…ささいな自由であれば関知するつもりはない。尊敬受けし自由開拓者よ、その自由がお前に与えられたものであろうと、これから再度与えられるものであろうとも」
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition, which I represent, is willing to show extraordinary faith in your person. For the sake of our invaluable partnership, I am going to ignore any... minor liberties that you, esteemed Rogue Trader, may have afforded yourself or may again in the future."

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問庁の代表は私だ。お前という人間を特別に篤く信頼しようではないか。真に有益な相互関係のために、私は何であれ…ささいな自由であれば関知するつもりはない。尊敬受けし自由開拓者よ、その自由がお前に与えられたものであろうと、これから再度与えられるものであろうとも」

languages.original_text: "The Inquisition, which I represent, is willing to show extraordinary faith in your person. For the sake of our invaluable partnership, I am going to ignore any... minor liberties that you, esteemed Rogue Trader, may have afforded yourself or may again in the future."

languages.text: “我所代表的审判庭愿意赐予你极大的信任，尊敬的行商浪人。为了维护我们宝贵的合作关系，无论是现在还是将来，我都愿意容忍你小小的……肆意妄为。”
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition, which I represent, is willing to show extraordinary faith in your person. For the sake of our invaluable partnership, I am going to ignore any... minor liberties that you, esteemed Rogue Trader, may have afforded yourself or may again in the future."

traits.locale_text: “我所代表的审判庭愿意赐予你极大的信任，尊敬的行商浪人。为了维护我们宝贵的合作关系，无论是现在还是将来，我都愿意容忍你小小的……肆意妄为。”

languages.text: «La Inquisición, de la que soy representante, está dispuesta a mostrar una gran fe en su persona. Por el bien de nuestra valiosa asociación, estoy dispuesto a ignorar cualquier... libertad menor que se haya permitido o se vaya a permitir en el futuro, estimad{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition, which I represent, is willing to show extraordinary faith in your person. For the sake of our invaluable partnership, I am going to ignore any... minor liberties that you, esteemed Rogue Trader, may have afforded yourself or may again in the future."

traits.locale_text: «La Inquisición, de la que soy representante, está dispuesta a mostrar una gran fe en su persona. Por el bien de nuestra valiosa asociación, estoy dispuesto a ignorar cualquier... libertad menor que se haya permitido o se vaya a permitir en el futuro, estimad{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: « L'Inquisition, que je représente, a décidé de vous accorder sa confiance. Dans l'intérêt de notre partenariat, je vais ignorer toutes les... libertés que vous, honorable {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, avez prises par le passé ou pourriez prendre à l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition, which I represent, is willing to show extraordinary faith in your person. For the sake of our invaluable partnership, I am going to ignore any... minor liberties that you, esteemed Rogue Trader, may have afforded yourself or may again in the future."

traits.locale_text: « L'Inquisition, que je représente, a décidé de vous accorder sa confiance. Dans l'intérêt de notre partenariat, je vais ignorer toutes les... libertés que vous, honorable {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, avez prises par le passé ou pourriez prendre à l'avenir. »

languages.text: "Die Inquisition, die ich repräsentiere, ist bereit, Eurer Person ungewöhnliches Vertrauen entgegenzubringen. Zum Wohle unserer unbezahlbaren Partnerschaft werde ich alle ... kleinen Freiheiten ignorieren, die Ihr, {mf|geschätzter Freihändler|geschätzte Freihändlerin} Euch bislang genommen habt oder in Zukunft nehmen werdet."
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition, which I represent, is willing to show extraordinary faith in your person. For the sake of our invaluable partnership, I am going to ignore any... minor liberties that you, esteemed Rogue Trader, may have afforded yourself or may again in the future."

traits.locale_text: "Die Inquisition, die ich repräsentiere, ist bereit, Eurer Person ungewöhnliches Vertrauen entgegenzubringen. Zum Wohle unserer unbezahlbaren Partnerschaft werde ich alle ... kleinen Freiheiten ignorieren, die Ihr, {mf|geschätzter Freihändler|geschätzte Freihändlerin} Euch bislang genommen habt oder in Zukunft nehmen werdet."

languages.text: "Engizisyon ki onu ben temsil ediyorum, sana oldukça iyi bir niyetle bakıyor. Süregelen iş birliğimize verdiğimiz değerden ötürü, çok değerli Hür Tacir'in verdiği veya gelecekte verebileceği çeşitli küçük çaplı imtiyazları görmezden geleceğim."
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition, which I represent, is willing to show extraordinary faith in your person. For the sake of our invaluable partnership, I am going to ignore any... minor liberties that you, esteemed Rogue Trader, may have afforded yourself or may again in the future."

traits.locale_text: "Engizisyon, ki kendisini ben temsil ediyorum, sana olağanüstü bir inanç gösterme arzusunda. Yapmakta olduğumuz iş birliğimize değer verdiğimizden ötürü, çok değerli Hür Tacir'in kullandığı veya gelecekte kullanabileceği çeşitli küçük çaplı imtiyazları görmezden geleceğim."
